data.title: nordic Research
data.meta_description: Search the database for recent research mobility projects between the Nordic countries and France. Sort by country, researcher or domain.
data.text:
Search

An extensive list of mobility programs from 2014 onwards between France and the Nordic countries (Denmark, Finland, Norway, Sweden) is available in the table below. Feel free to find out more about the scientific and academic projects and the researchers who conducted them. You can learn more about past and ongoing projects by clicking on the project’s name, or on the “View” button, which will bring you to a more detailed travel report. You can also sort the projects by clicking on the “Countries” column or by using the search bar. Type the name of the desired country, the researcher(s) or the domain which approaches your research interest, and results will appear accordingly. If you would like to do a double search, please enter the desired terms in the search bar without punctuation (e.g., if you are looking for projects regarding Mathematics in Sweden, enter: mathematics sweden).
